name: Seating Chart
prompt: Full visible document: 'Dinner Party Seating Chart' on textured cream paper. Title visible at top. Central diagram of a rectangular dining table with place settings. Handwritten cursive names at seats. Chaotic alterations: 'James Hartley' crossed out at head of table, rewritten near exit. Arrows indicating a swap between 'Dr. Chen' and 'Victoria Sterling'. Ink smudges, tea stains. Vintage 1920s style.
